description: Number of monomials in expansion of determinant of an n X n Toeplitz matrix [ t(|i-j|) ] in terms of its entries.
mathematica: f[n_] := Length[ Expand[ Det[ Table[ t[ Abs[ i - j]], {i, 1, n}, {j, 1, n}]]]]; Table[ f[n], {n, 1, 11}]
author: Herbert Wilf (wilf(AT)central.cis.upenn.edu)
extensions: Terms a(12) and a(13) from _Thotsaporn Thanatipanonda_, Jan 26-28 2012
Terms a(14) and a(15) from _Roman Pearce_, Aug 30 2014
